DOC.brief_title: Safety Tolerability Study SNS-314 Advanced Solid Tumors
DOC.detailed_description: Other objective study include measure pharmacokinetics ( long drug measure blood ) .
DOC.criteria: Advanced solid tumor measurable scan Uncontrolled untreated central nervous system metastases Cerebrovascular accident/transient ischemic attack 6 month Cycle 1 Day 1 Any follow cardiac condition : History myocardial infarction , acute coronary syndrome 12 week Cycle 1 Day 1 Class III IV heart failure 6 month Cycle 1 Day 1 Baseline heart rate correct QT interval ( QTc ) > 450 msec History ventricular arrhythmias 6 month Cycle 1 Day 1 Use medication prolong QTc interval associate Torsades de Pointe ( TdP ) Previous cancer treatment 21 day first dose Any investigational therapy 28 day Cycle 1 Day 1 Known allergy cyclodextrins Please note : There additional inclusion/exclusion criterion study . Please contact study center additional information determine study criterion meet .
